name: Polar Survival
description:
Inspired by What Remains of Eddie Finch, Draugen and South of the Circle, these three games tell the story of a pilot who survives an emergency landing, struggles to survive on a lonely polar island, and eventually manages to escape with his life.

How to operate：

WASD - move

Space-jump

Mouse movement - control view

Tab-pause

(All assets in the game are free and not commercially available)
